message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, since I'm making the first offer.  What do you say?
You wanted 60/40, I'll give you 20, now it's your turn to negotiate!
Okay, I see you're playing hardball. I'll raise my offer to 45/55, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
